app.name: papayalabs
app.title: Creativity with Excellence and Simplicity
app.created_by: Papayalabs OÜ © All Rights Reserved - Copyright 2021

greywrap.description_1: Excellence is present from the moment we start with the development. We don't think it's feasible to do it later so we must anticipate possible unnecessary complexities and keep the code clean and simple.
greywrap.description_2: We can't solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them. Here is that new and different kind of thinking.
greywrap.description_3: The beauty is in the balance of things. And in the balance between creative design and functionality create beautiful solutions that you will love to use

about.about_description_1: We are a software development company based in Estonia but without any permanent establishment  physical location.
about.about_description_2: Our team is located in a variety of places with different nationalities and cultures. We have clients that we help with their projects and also we have our own projects and apps.

divider_2.divider_title: WE LIKE TO CREATE GREAT THINGS WITH EXCELLENCE

portfolio.title: PROYECTS
portfolio.description_1: Artsite.io is a software as service (SaaS) that will enable artists to create their website with an elegant and minimalist design and give them the tools to promote themselves.
portfolio.description_2: Pymenta is a very simple Cloud ERP System designed to work in the cloud and allow small companies to create, manage and print documents ( invoices, notes, quotations, credits, etc). You can manage warehouses, providers, clients, products and stock.
portfolio.description_3: Homeoagora is built to give homeopathic doctors and the patient a space to interact

contact.address: Lõõtsa tn 5-11, 11415, Tallinn, Estonia. Email: admin@papayalabs.io
